title: Implement GetMissionForTask() helper
description: Implement method to walk up the dependency tree from a task to find its parent mission epic. Missions are epics with subtype='mission'.
design:
Algorithm:
1. Start with taskID
2. Walk parent-child dependencies upward
3. Check each parent's IssueSubtype field
4. Return first epic with subtype='mission'
5. Return mission ID, sandbox path (future), branch name (future)

Implementation in internal/storage/beads/methods.go as GetMissionForTask(ctx, taskID) (*MissionContext, error)
acceptance_criteria:
- GetMissionForTask() method added to Storage interface
- Method walks dependency tree upward
- Returns mission with subtype='mission'
- Returns error if no mission found
- Returns MissionContext with missionID (sandbox/branch TBD)
- Unit tests verify tree walking with nested epics
